description: TL;DR Seemingly Abandoned. --- This is a very nice replica of what NordVPN offers from there site for Windows GUI users. However, others have left reviews that Java errors plague the plugin. Keeping an open mind, I tried it anyway and had the same errors. Because of this and others in the past complaining of the same problem but the developer doesn't seem to update lends to a thought that this project was abandoned.
Would like to use this but...

Ad nauseum, same uncaught Java Script errors with no fix from developer. Why bother with this SW? It is Jan 2020 and last comment with this error is March 2019. Why can't this be fixed? Can't give 0 stars for programs thay do not work at all!
Don't waste your time.

Does not work, and I would also love to have this...
Especially since I'm new to ubuntu and have no idea how to fix with Nordvpn unless it's "point and click".
Upon launch, several JavaScript errors appear and the application is unusable after that. The UI does show up, but cannot be used.
Please fix. I am fine with the terminal, but would prefer GUI instead.
Java error when launched. It would be awesome if this actually worked tho. This is for sure what I have been wanting.
Please replace this with a native Linux application.
It gives a javascript error on launch and everytime you click on something. Unusable.

description:
For the better part, this is merely another gateway to NordVPN's web interface. The software allows entering one's credentials, but nothing else, and it gives numerous errors at startup.

Not recommended. Also, one should change their NordVPN password after uninstalling this software.
